installed.title: Installed Skills
installed.summaryCounts: Folder: {{projectCount}} • Global: {{globalCount}} • Delete with the trash icon.
installed.emptySearch: No installed skills match your search.
installed.emptyHint: Install a starter skill above, or paste a SKILL.md in Advanced. You can remove skills later with the trash icon.

templates.title: Skill Templates
templates.emptySearch: No starter skills match your search.

import.title: Import Skill
import.description: Import skills from files or URLs

conflicts.title: Conflict Resolution
conflicts.description: A skill with this name already exists

runtime.title: Runtime note
runtime.body: Some skills and packs may ask Tandem to run local tools (Python, Node, bash, etc.). Tandem does not bundle these runtimes. Installing a skill does not run anything by itself; a runtime is only needed if a skill instructs the agent to execute commands.

errors.chooseImportFirst: Choose a SKILL.md or zip file first.

help.autoUse: Tandem automatically uses installed skills when relevant - no selection needed.
help.marketingPreferred: Prefer: product-marketing-context, content-strategy, seo-audit, social-content, copywriting, copy-editing, email-sequence, competitor-alternatives, launch-strategy.
help.marketingLegacy: Legacy marketing templates remain available as fallback, but should not be your default route.
